value:
If the world was free from war,
would every day be more like
the Day of Devotion?

Every soul in Askr is precious to me,
like family. That includes the Heroes
too of course.

I may not be a great warrior, but
I excel at supporting those who
are important to me.$k$pThat's a technique born of love,
wouldn't you say?

Back then, we'd always enjoy the
Day of Devotion festivities together.
Hm? Oh, just thinking of the past...

It's a lovely outfit, don't you think?
I've been preparing for this festival
since it appeared on the horizon.

My, what a lovely castle! Now, I have
an invitation to the Day of Devotion
festival from $Nf.

Fear not, for we have love
on our side.

Chin up. It's the Day
of Devotion, after all!

Hmm... I can't seem to get
in the spirit today...

Oh, for me? Are you sure?
I will take good care of it.

I am the queen of Askr, Henriette.
The Day of Devotion is my favorite
time of year. I hope you enjoy it too.

Are you enjoying the festival? I love
every moment of it, of course.$k$pLove is an odd thing... It's not like
any legendary weapon or tome, but
it can steel our hearts.$k$pIt creates bonds between us and
our children, and their children...
and on even beyond that.$k$pI hope Alfonse and Sharena learn
the power of love as I have. That
would make me truly happy.$k$pOf course, with your love for this
land as a model, they can learn
much, $Nu.$k$pBut enough talk of the future. This
festival isn't over. So let us take the
opportunity to celebrate love.
えいっ！
No, no, no!
きゃああっ！
Not good...
I don't want to lose control.
That power... Never again.
I am holding back.
I apologize.
I'm so sorry, Sharena...
うふふっ
I'm Alfonse and Sharena's mother. Please, call me Henriette.
Aah! Oh, you. You like to tease people, don't you?
Oh, I'm so glad to see that all of you are doing well. I've been so worried!
Alfonse has a tendency to rush in. He's very brave, but as his mother...it worries me.
Sharena is so sweet, but that just makes me worry about her more.
It doesn't matter what happens to me. As long as my children are safe...
I feel my whole family owes you a debt of gratitude.
Yes, of course!
What now?
Right away!
